resources.string:
Counter Tally is an app where you can pray as well as count the number of times you pray. 
 There are Two options in the App :- 
 1. You Can Set a Target for counting. 
 2. You can count till the time you want. 
 The app will vibrate for a long time on every 100 count and on target achievement it will ask you that do you want to pray more or not. 
 Developed By Mohammed Faiyyaz Khatri 
 Thanks for your support 
 May all of us get the reward for this good deed. 
 Please give your valuable feedback it will help in further improvement
